processed.text:
Hi.  You can ask me questions such as the following

* how do I create groups

* how do I develop playbooks

* how do i promote playbooks

Just remember to use the '*yoda*' trigger word - or click on one of the following topics to get you started...
processed.messageML:
Hi. You can ask me questions such as the following

  • how do I create groups

  • how do I develop playbooks

  • how do i promote playbooks

Just remember to use the 'yoda' trigger word - or click on one of the following topics to get you started...
